title: Machinery showcase block in Process section with token-based colors and static images

requirements.summary: Add an in-page “Machinery” content block within the existing Process section showing key husk-processing machines with English titles and short descriptions in a responsive grid.
acceptanceCriteria: The Process section includes a clearly labeled “Machinery” block visible on the page without adding a new route.
The block contains at least 3 machinery items, each with an English title and 1–2 sentence description focused on husk processing.
Layout is responsive (single column on mobile, multi-column grid on wider screens).

file_operations.description: Compose a new “Machinery” block inside the existing Process section (no new route): add a heading, intro copy, and a responsive grid rendering at least 3 machinery items (husk/dehusking machine, separator/cleaner, packing machine) with clear English titles and 1–2 sentence husk-processing descriptions.

Create a reusable MachineryBlock component to render the Machinery heading + responsive machinery card grid; export it for composition within ProcessSection (ensure it is imported and rendered so it is not orphaned).

requirements.summary: Style the Machinery block using existing design tokens to create a clear visual hierarchy while keeping the overall page background pure white.
acceptanceCriteria: All Machinery block containers remain on white page background (no tinted/gray section backgrounds).
Machinery cards use consistent token-based colors (e.g., primary for emphasis, subtle accent backgrounds) with readable contrast for text.
No changes introduce non-white full-bleed backgrounds or gradients.

file_operations.description: Apply token-based styling to Machinery cards and content hierarchy: keep section/container background white; use existing tokens/classes (card, border, primary, accent) for card surfaces, borders, icon/image framing, titles, and body text; ensure hover/focus states do not introduce tinted section backgrounds or gradients.
Ensure the new Machinery block placement and surrounding spacing aligns with existing Process section styling conventions and preserves the pure white background requirement across the full section.

requirements.summary: Add three static machinery images under public assets and render them in the Machinery block with English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: All required images are added under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the Machinery block.
Images are displayed with appropriate alt text in English.

file_operations.description: Add the required static image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/husk-machine-01.dim_1200x800.png (clean flat illustration of a husk/dehusking machine with neutral background).

Add the required static image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/separator-machine-01.dim_1200x800.png (clean flat illustration of a grain/husk separator/cleaner machine with neutral background).
Add the required static image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/packing-machine-01.dim_1200x800.png (clean flat illustration of a packaging/packing machine with neutral background).

Reference the static images from the public assets directory and render them in each machinery card with appropriate English alt text; ensure image sizing/cropping is consistent and responsive, and that builds do not produce missing-asset errors.
